alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 10 at 12:37PM PDT until April 12 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Indian Wells Valley and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited Highway 58 through Tehachapi Pass, and U.S. Highway 395 north of Randsburg.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
